eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.items

Interface IExpandable<VH extends ExpandableViewHolder,S extends IFlexible>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IFlexible<VH>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractExpandableHeaderItem, AbstractExpandableItem

    public interface IExpandable<VH extends ExpandableViewHolder,S extends IFlexible>
extends IFlexible<VH>
    Interface to manage expanding operations on items with FlexibleAdapter.

    Implements this interface or use AbstractExpandableItem.

    Since:
    17/01/2016 Created
    18/06/2016 Changed signature with ExpandableViewHolder
    See Also:
    IFlexible, IFilterable, IHeader, IHolder, ISectionable

    • Method Detail

      • isExpanded

        boolean isExpanded()

      • setExpanded

      • getExpansionLevel

        int getExpansionLevel()
        Establish the level of the expansion of this type of item in case of multi level expansion.

        Default value of first level should return 0.

        Sub expandable items should return a level +1 for each sub level.
        Returns:
        the level of the expansion of this type of item

      • getSubItems

        java.util.List<S> getSubItems()
